text: Upon complaint of any person, the Superior Court of the District of Columbia shall have jurisdiction in equity to restrain and enjoin any act forbidden or declared illegal by any provisions of this chapter.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-2108.

1973 Ed., § 47-3008.

DC CODE § 47-2108

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Jurisdiction of Superior Court to enjoin violations of this chapter.
